title: Подслушано в Рыбинске
overview: The plot centers on a journalist from a small provincial newspaper, Yura, who has been writing unremarkable news from his hometown all his life. But suddenly an event happens to Yura that turns his whole life upside down - he receives visions that predict murders that are secretly and unnoticed taking place in Rybinsk. However, the situation will soon become complicated by the fact that in one of the cases Yura becomes the main suspect
